title: jamyr
author: jamyr
content: I suddenly find it very much better to use wap interface while reading. Advantage include, no images etc etc.  However went back to the conventional webpage whilst formatting this post for preview and so. i dream to be a "desirable" again. For signature campaigns, etcSending a merit will help me achieve that, but consistently posting "constructively" will let me stay that way.I will try my best.

comments.author: jamyr
comments.body: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5446733.new;wap2#newGives me this view.I suddenly miss my Nokia browser.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Wap version of forum is already there since the very beginning, it is included on any SMF version, usually you can find it on google as it is indexed too besides the original looks/layout/url without ;wap or ;wap2.

comments.author: jamyr
comments.body: i had this feeling like I just discovered fire.well its gone now. LOLJust for folks like me who didnt know this exists.
